name: TNN Motorsports HardCore TR
description: Hardcore 4x4s and Hot Rods battle for Truck Racing Supremacy! Over 30 courses on U.S. tracks: From the muddy everglades of Florida to the deserts of Arizona. 24 customizable off-road and hot rod trucks, each with distinct characteristics. Replay made to relive all the white-knuckle racing action. Two-player split screen mode for hardcore head-to-head racing. Intense day and night racing through rain, snow, and even fog.
